<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6957|קַו]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוְקָו‎</span> (or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוְקַו‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָוְקָו‎</span>) **noun [masculine]** ==might== (?); — so read (according to most) for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוקָֿו‎</span> in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּוֺי ק‎</span> [[Isa.18.2|Isa 18:2]]; [[Isa.18.7|Isa 18:7]] i.e. ***a mighty nation*** (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strength***; see (on reduplication) [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:123e»§ 123e</sup>); &gt; [[BDB#RV|RV]] '***meting out***' conquered lands, literally 'of line, line' (11. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַו‎</span>). 

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּר‎</span>] **verb** ==bore, dig== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***cut a round hole in, scoop out***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַרְתִּי‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.24|2Kgs 19:24]] ***I have dug*** (that is, a well)= [[Isa.37.25|Isa 37:25]] ([[BDB#Meinh|Meinh]] conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרִתִי‎</span>). — 

**Hiph\`il, Pilpel**, see I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרר‎</span>. 



 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַר‎</span>] **verb** ==be cold== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be cold***, so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Ithpa\`al 1 singular ***cool onself*** (rare); [[BDB#Levy|Levy]] compare also Late Hebrew Nithp. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִתְקָרֵר‎</span> ***grow calm*** [i.e. cool]); — 

**Hiph\`il** ***make*** or ***keep cool: Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקֵ֫רָה‎</span>, figurative, [[Jer.6.7|Jer 6:7]]b Jerusalem ***keepeth*** her wickedness ***cool***, fresh; ***Infinitive construct*** metaplastic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָקִיר‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67v»§ 67v</sup>) v[[Jer.6.7|Jer 6:7]]a, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר‎</span> ***keeping*** water ***cool*** (simile). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַר‎</span>] **verb Pilpel** ==tear down== (?) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרְקֵר‎</span> ***tear down*** wall); — only ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַרְקַר קִר‎</span> [[Isa.22.5|Isa 22:5]] usually (men are) ***tearing down wall*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***s***), but see  I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִיר‎</span> **3** ***near the end***.
